title: Aeroplane Child
description: the childrens book is a happy and joyous look a aeroplanes and all kinds of colors on every page in the book. the book is full of rhythm and rhyme to make the book flow better as the child is seeing and hearing colorful words and colors of the aeroplanes and background color. the focus of the book is to make the child want to read and draw pictures on a piece of paper. its a high flying adventure for the child's imagination. and to open up the world of new sounds and sceens through out the book. the book will be carried around the home of the child so as to know what is important to them and they want to keep it close to their body. and with a little bit of help and some time the child will be able to draw a aeroplane.
author: Larry Don Cornell Sr.
